name: Void Dawn
description:
Commands Maps Below are a list of common commands you'll be be using throughout your adventure. There are others that I have not listed but I'm hoping that intuition will kick in and you'll be able to understand what might be a command.

command [OPTIONAL|OTHER]

> go NORTH|SOUTH|EAST|WEST|INSIDE|OUTSIDE|UP|DOWN
> N|S|E|W|IN|OUT|UP|DOWN

> look [at SOMETHING|SOMEONE]
> greet [SOMEONE]
> ask SOMEONE about SOMETHING Red Mountain Vivec, Temple Canton Remiros' Remorse Manifold Spires Credits
  • Alice the Fangirl for hosting the Morrowind Writing Competition 2023.
  • Greatness7, Remiros, PhDinSorcery, and Meriyal for the Manifold Spires mod.
  • vvardenfellstormsage for his writing advice.
Disclaimer

This game was made with the help of ChatGPT for Inform7's functionality only.
All dialogue is wholly human in its origin.
